metadata.title: CVE-2016-5102 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Buffer overflow in the readgifimage function in gif2tiff.c in the gif2tifftool in LibTIFF 4.0.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(segmentation fault) via a crafted gif file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5102` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
libtiff-tools - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
libtiff5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.6-1ubuntu0.4').
